page.title: 02THORNHILL HOME LIFE
page.content: I wake up at about half past seven have a wash and put my clothes on. I then go down stairs to have my breakfast. It consists of cereal, toast and usually a drink of milk. After,I brush my teeth and wash my face then go down to school. It starts at nine o'clock and at half past ten we have play time. Then at quarter past twelve it is lunch. School finishes at half past three. Then I take my dog for a walk for about 25 minutes. After that I play with my friends or watch television. At about quarter to six we have our dinner which is usually a two course cooked meal. Afterwards I do my flute practice.At about half past nine I go to bed and read for half an hour.Then -sleep!
